TextData.LocalizedString:
Creates a giant ball of darkness
and hurls it at an enemy.

TextData.SourceString:
Fires three balls of malice
that relentlessly pursue an enemy.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Fires three balls of malice
that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

TextData.SourceString:
Hurls poison sludge
at an enemy.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Hurls poison sludge
at an enemy.

TextData.SourceString:
Unleashes a sphere of darkness 
that slowly tracks down the enemy.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Unleashes a sphere of darkness 
that slowly tracks down the enemy.

TextData.SourceString: Fires a menacing ball of dark energy that pursues enemies.
TextData.LocalizedString: Fires a menacing ball of dark energy that pursues enemies.

TextData.SourceString: en Text
TextData.LocalizedString: en Text

TextData.SourceString:
Calls down numerous small meteorites
and launches them at an enemy.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Calls down numerous small meteorites
and launches them at an enemy.

TextData.SourceString:
Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy,
dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy,
dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

TextData.SourceString:
Quickly discharges draconic energy,
damaging those around it.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Quickly discharges draconic energy,
damaging those around it.

TextData.SourceString:
Hurls an energy ball imbued
with draconic energy at an enemy.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Hurls an energy ball imbued
with draconic energy at an enemy.
